review: We love this not only for streaming video but for displaying our pictures for our family members who have vision difficulties. We used the Chromecast to show my mother-in-law pictures of her new grandsons because we were able to cast them onto our flat screen, she was able to walk up to the television and really see their faces. We have tried to show them to her on our computers and other devices but nothing was able to show her their faces like the chromecast. We also showed her videos of the rest of the family members. It was really an incredible experience for everyone.
author: Joanne Grant

review: I can understand the complaints that there are not enough apps that support Chromecast but for us it is actually perfect. We have children with flat screens and laptops and the urge to play YouTube videos on their TV's is the big thing. With an inexpensive Chromecast device they can do that without wires running from the TV to laptop. I prefer that for safety reasons. For the adults in the home, we use Netflix and any website that I can access with Chrome. It's cheap and effective and most importantly, it works. It charges on the TV so still no wires running a power outlet. Great price, good convenience and highly recommended.
